You clicked help button In this app, you can check up to date soccer news. Click the news you are interested in can save to the favourite. Click the favourite news button to check the saved list.
OC Transpo App Search ENTER
Enter the name of a movie Search Movie Type movie name here
1) Type a movie name and click search button\n 2) Click ADD icon to save to favourite\n 3) Click CLEAR icon to start a new search\n 4) Click FAVOURITE to see saved movies list\n 5) Click a movie to view detail or delete\n
Help Menu Searching... Please wait: Sorry, cannot find this movie. Do you want to add this movie to your favourite? Cancel Add This movie has already in your favourite movie list. Undo Delete Do you want to view detail or delete the movie? View Detail
Do you want to add this station to your favourite? Cancel Add Station already in your favourite list. Undo
Electric car charging finder help menu
Please follow the steps for the App: 1.Input a latitude and a longitude number 2.Click on "Charging station near by" button 3.Choose one of the station name for detail information 4.You can save your favourite station into your favourite folder 5.You can delete your saved station in favourite folder
charging_station_not_found No charging station found This Charging Station Information are saved Getting Charging Station List We are going to get a list of Electric car charging stations near by.
